summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 JEEP PATRIOT. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V668000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. IN ADDITION, THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE AIR BAG WARNING SENSOR ILLUMINATED INTERMITTENTLY. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT A REMEDY WOULD BE AVAILABLE BY APRIL OR JUNE, HOWEVER NO REMEDY HAS BEEN PROVIDED. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
